alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 9:16AM CST until February 08 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Greene, Perry and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf Near Mclain. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CST Monday was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday morning and continue falling to 12.7 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
